body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Green Wheels customer support. My name is Carl Russell. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Laura Parker.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Laura. How can I assist you today? I understand you may be feeling disappointed.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I am a bit disappointed with the pricing at your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see. Could you share with me the amount in numbers of the price difference you were expecting?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was hoping for a reduction of two zero zero zero dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that. Can you also provide me with your contact number so I can look into this issue further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my contact number is five five five- two three four- one zero zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Laura, for providing me with the details. I will investigate this matter and get back to you soon. Your time is appreciated. Have a great day.
